mapper.select: select room.room_seq, B.checkdate from( SELECT A.room_seq, CASE WHEN A.cnt = 0 THEN 'true' WHEN A.cnt is null THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS 'checkdate' FROM( SELECT reservation.ROOM_SEQ AS room_seq, count(*) AS cnt FROM reservation WHERE DATE(reservation.CHECKIN_DATE) BETWEEN #{checkin_date} AND #{checkout_date} AND reservation.ROOM_SEQ in ( SELECT room.ROOM_SEQ FROM room ) GROUP BY reservation.room_seq )A )B RIGHT OUTER JOIN room ON B.ROOM_SEQ = room.ROOM_SEQ JOIN accommodation ON accommodation.ACCOM_SEQ = room.ACCOM_SEQ WHERE accommodation.ACCOM_SEQ = #{accom_seq} GROUP BY room.room_seq

select room.room_seq, B.checkdate from( SELECT A.room_seq, CASE WHEN A.cnt = 0 THEN 'true' WHEN A.cnt is null THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS 'checkdate' FROM( SELECT reservation.ROOM_SEQ AS room_seq, count(*) AS cnt FROM reservation WHERE DATE(reservation.CHECKIN_DATE) BETWEEN #{checkin_date} AND #{checkout_date} AND reservation.ROOM_SEQ in ( SELECT room.ROOM_SEQ FROM room ) GROUP BY reservation.room_seq )A )B RIGHT OUTER JOIN room ON B.ROOM_SEQ = room.ROOM_SEQ JOIN accommodation ON accommodation.ACCOM_SEQ = room.ACCOM_SEQ WHERE room.ROOM_SEQ = #{room_seq} GROUP BY room.room_seq

SELECT a.ACCOM_ADDR,a.ACCOM_SEQ, a.ACCOM_PHOTO1,a.ACCOM_ADDR, Min(b.ROOM_PRICE) AS PRICE, a.ACCOM_INTRODUCTION, a.LONGITUDE, a.LATITUDE, a.ACCOM_INTRODUCE, a.ACCOM_NAME FROM accommodation a join room b on a.ACCOM_SEQ like b.ACCOM_SEQ WHERE a.ACCOM_ADDR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accom_addr},'%') AND a.ACCOM_TYPE LIKE #{accom_type} GROUP BY a.ACCOM_SEQ
